main: ^Hey there. If you're settled in, you can start pullin' your weight. First things first:
^Whatever those folk that took you are up to, seems like they've been workin' out of a church in town.
^If you're lookin' to try and stop this, that's the first place I'd go. And I would, but I don't have that arm of yours.
^Best talk to the Bishop over there before you leave, if you haven't already.
^> "Is there anything else I should know?"

c-0: ^ This all came out of nowhere, but you seem to have a handle on things. Is there anything else I should know?
c-1: ^ I'll make sure to speak with him.

elaboration: ^Here's what I know. All this has got somethin' to do with Pacific Manifest, the rail company that's been layin' track all through the valley.
^We used to work for 'em, but I organized some folk and we went on strike. We been holed up here since.
^I got us out of there right when I figured that they were up to no good. Folk were disappearin', or comin' to work different.
^That church is my best bet at findin' out what happened. So... I'd appreciate the help. Like I said, Micah can tell you more.
